response.overview: Rose faces the harsh reality that her work laptop isn't her friend, a place where she can keep secrets and work at the same time. If the problem isn't fixed, not only her work files could be damaged, but her intimate videos could also leak online. So, no matter how obscene or inappropriate Trevor's IT questions may be, she'll have to trust him to get the problem resolved quickly.  Diane and Gordon (Jamie Michelle and James Sinner) have been trying to find a way to get their teenage freeloader, Melody (Sophia Burns), to move out and start her own life. However, no matter what they do or say, Sophia always finds a way to stay put. She's stubborn and resentful, to say the least. Then one day, Diane and Gordon come up with a brilliant idea. They invite Melody's creepy step-cousin, Stephen (Robbie Echo), to live with them. Melody is confused: they don't have a guest bedroom, so where will Stephen stay?
response.title: Troubleshooting
